titleStmt.title: Certaine helpes and remedies vnder God to prevent dearth and scarcitie also to kill and destroy heath, brakes, mosse or any other shrubs vvhatsoever, and to improove the sayd ground : with divers other points of husbandrie never yet practised by any.
titleStmt.author: Shaw, John, writer on agriculture.

titleStmt.title: Certaine helpes and remedies vnder God to prevent dearth and scarcitie also to kill and destroy heath, brakes, mosse or any other shrubs vvhatsoever, and to improove the sayd ground : with divers other points of husbandrie never yet practised by any.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Shaw by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
